name: 殳國俊
objective:
本課程特色在從材料科學的角度出發, 重新探討材料的基礎物理性質, 例如: 從鍵結型態討論能帶結構, 從晶體結構討論配格場論等

This course re-discussed the physical properties from the perspective of materials science, such as the relationship between chemical bond and band structures, crystal structure vs. crystal field theory, etc.
schedule:
W1-5 原子結構與鍵結 (atomic structure and bonding)
W6-10 晶體結構與配位場論 (crystal structure and coordination field theory)
W11-15 電學與磁學 (electricity and magnetism) 
W16-20 導熱與光學 (thermal and optical)
scorePolicy:
(1) 期中考35% (Midterm Examination: 35%)
(2) 期末考40% (Final Examination: 40%)
(3) 作業 (包含原文補充資料閱讀與英文寫作) 25%  (Homework: 25%)
materials:
physics for scientists and engineerings, tenth edition, Raymond A. Serway

Introduction to solid state physics, eighth edition, C. Kittel
